data.title: Fall 2022 IMPACT – A Royal Reunion by Regent University
data.meta_description:
Stay up-to-date on the activities and accomplishments of Regent students, alumni, faculty, and staff with the university’s Impact newsletter.
 
The...
data.text: Stay up-to-date on the activities and accomplishments of Regent students, alumni, faculty, and staff with the university’s Impact newsletter. The Fall 2022 issue includes: •A Royal Reunion: Alumni from as far back as 1984 and as far away as Arizona enjoyed a nostalgic time of fellowship and fun at Alumni Weekend 2022. •Building a Case for Excellence: Since its founding, the Robertson Center for Constitutional Law has played a key role in landmark Supreme Court decisions. •Leading the Way: The School of Divinity enters its 40th year with a vision to reach the world. •Unwavering Faith: A Regent alumna and her husband step out in faith to increase their giving in the midst of a grim health diagnosis. •Embracing a Royal Vision: Regent deepens its commitment to training scholar-athletes as Christian leaders both on and off the court. •Alumni News: We're highlighting the notable career achievements of alumni all around the world. impact.regent.edu
